DOC.HEADLINE: METROPOLITAN DIGEST / LOS ANGELES COUNTY NEWS IN BRIEF : LOS ANGELES COUNTY ; DEADLINE FOR QUAKE AID APPLICATIONS EXTENDED
DOC.TEXT: The deadline for nonprofit organizations that sustained earthquake damage to apply for disaster assistance has been extended_to until March 18 . The Federal Emergency Management Agency offers various forms of disaster assistance to nonprofit organizations and individuals , and damage need not have occurred on Jan . 17 to be covered . To register potential claims with FEMA , call ( 800 ) 462-9029 or the California Office of Emergency Services at ( 818 ) 405-7350 .
